    • Field Detail

      • DefaultAddMode

        protected static int DefaultAddMode

      • NO_DUPS

        public static final int NO_DUPS
        throw an exception if a duplicate object is added. This is Default.
        See Also:
        HubController#setAddMode, Constant Field Values

      • IGNORE_DUPS

        public static final int IGNORE_DUPS
        dont store object if a duplicate is already stored. If the object is being deserialized (see OAObject.readResolve) then the object that is already loaded will be used.
        See Also:
        HubController#setAddMode, OAObject.readResolve(), Constant Field Values

      • OVERWRITE_DUPS

        public static final int OVERWRITE_DUPS
        store object even if another exists
        See Also:
        HubController#setAddMode, Constant Field Values

      • IGNORE_ALL

        public static final int IGNORE_ALL
        dont store objects.
        See Also:
        HubController#setAddMode, Constant Field Values

      • MODE_MAX

        protected static final int MODE_MAX
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public OAObjectCacheDelegate()

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectAllHubs

        public static Hub[] getSelectAllHubs(java.lang.Class clazz)
        Automatically set by Hub.select() when a select is done without a where clause. A weakReference is used for storage. When a new OAObject is created, it will be added to a SelectAllHub.
        Since:
        2007/08/16

      • getSelectAllHub

        public static Hub getSelectAllHub(java.lang.Class clazz)
        returns first hub from getSelectAllHubs()

      • setSelectAllHub

        public static void setSelectAllHub(Hub hub)
        Used by Hub.select() to register a Hub that has all data selected.
        Since:
        2007/08/16

      • removeSelectAllHub

        public static void removeSelectAllHub(Hub hub)
        Used by Hub to unregister a Hub that had all data selected.
        Since:
        2007/08/16

      • removeAllSelectAllHubs

        public static void removeAllSelectAllHubs()

      • setNamedHub

        public static void setNamedHub(java.lang.String name,
               Hub hub)
        Used to store a global hub by name, using a weakReference.
        Parameters:
        name - reference name to use, not case-sensitive

      • getNamedHub

        public static Hub getNamedHub(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a hub that is stored by name.
        Parameters:
        name - reference name to use, not case-sensitive
        Returns:
        if found then Hub, else null.

      • addListener

        public static void addListener(java.lang.Class clazz,
               OAObjectCacheListener l)
        Listeners support for HubEvents.

        The following events are sent:
        Events from Hubs: afterAdd, afterRemove
        Events from OAObjects: afterPropertyChange

      • removeListener

        public static void removeListener(java.lang.Class clazz,
                  OAObjectCacheListener l)
        See Also:

      • setDefaultAddMode

        public static void setDefaultAddMode(int mode)
        The DefaultAddMode determines how HubController.addObject() will handle an object if it already exists. This method sets the Default mode for all unassigned threads.
        Parameters:
        mode - AddModes are NO_DUPS (default), IGNORE_DUPS, OVERWRITE_DUPS.
        See Also:
        HubController#setAddMode

      • getDetaultAddMode

        public static int getDetaultAddMode()
        See Also:
        setDefaultAddMode(int)

      • add

        public static OAObject add(OAObject obj)
        Used by OAObject to cache new objects. Objects are removed by OAObject.finalize()
        Returns:
        either the object that was "obj" or the object that was already in the tree.
        See Also:
        #setAddMode(int)

      • clearCache

        public static void clearCache()
        Note: also use setDisableRemove, since the OAObject finalize will call remove from the cache.

      • find

      • _find

        protected static java.lang.Object _find(java.lang.Object fromObject,
                     java.lang.Class clazz,
                     java.lang.String propertyPath,
                     java.lang.Object findValue,
                     boolean bSkipNew,
                     boolean bThrowException,
                     int fetchAmount,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> alResults)
        Returns objects from the objectCache.
        Parameters:
        clazz - type of objects
        fromObject - null to start from the beginning, else use the last object previously returned.
        fetchAmount - max number to add to the alResults
        alResults - list of objects, after the fromObject
        Returns:
        last object in alResults, that can be used as the fromObject on the next call to fetch

      • _find

        protected static java.lang.Object _find(java.lang.Object fromObject,
                     java.lang.Class clazz,
                     OAFinder finder,
                     boolean bSkipNew,
                     boolean bThrowException,
                     int fetchAmount,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> alResults)

      • refresh

        public static void refresh(java.lang.Class clazz)
        Refresh all objects from the datasource. This will be ran on the server, if called by client then it will async to run on server.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class of objects to update, will also requery all hubs for this class.
